pr_title: DPC-1168: As an internal user I want a pop up when I'm trying to disable/delete org/user

timeline.message: Confirm delete user account pop up
Organization pop ups for disabling api & deleting

timeline.bodyText: This message confuses me.  Is this not a prompt to delete, not enable?
timeline.author: dhgreene
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -233,6 +233,6 @@
 
 <section class="ds-u-margin--2">
   <div class="ds-l-row ds-u-justify-content--center">
-    <%= link_to "Delete organization", internal_organization_url(@organization), method: :delete, class: "ds-u-color--error ds-u-text-align--center" %>
+    <%= link_to "Delete organization", internal_organization_url(@organization), data: { confirm: 'If it is enabled in an API all data will be permanently deleted. Are you sure you want to delete this organization?' }, method: :delete, class: "ds-u-color--error ds-u-text-align--center" %>

replies.bodyText: It is, but you can still delete an enabled organization, which delete everything in the API. I can run this language by the HC team if you would like.
replies.author: Sun-Mountain

replies.bodyText: I get it now.  @megmcf is this message good for you?
replies.author: dhgreene
